definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain

sentences.english: The false performance record drove up the stocks of WorldCom and won it great acclaims from the stock market.
sentences.chinese: 虚假的业绩使世通的股票上涨，股市一片赞誉。

sentences.english: We must emphasize basic management pragmatic, no sophistry is allowed and rash.
sentences.chinese: 抓基础管理一定要强调务实，来不得半点虚假和浮躁。

sentences.english: They were burned by the phony stock deal.
sentences.chinese: 他们在那虚假的股票交易中遭受损失。

sentences.english: This group of false gods chose Sirius to attempt this reinstatement within.
sentences.chinese: 这一群虚假神选择了天狼星来尝试这种内在恢复。

sentences.english: Beware of insincere friends around you.
sentences.chinese: 严防在您周围虚假的朋友。

sentences.english: An old expression of the sailors that is still heard is to sail under false colors.
sentences.chinese: 作者认为，也仍能听到老水手表达航行虚假的颜色。

sentences.english: That's all about a wrong god anyway. It's about a false god.
sentences.chinese: 它说的是一个错误的，虚假的上帝。

sentences.english: David Terrell continues to teach false doctrines.
sentences.chinese: 大卫特勒尔继续教虚假的教义。

sentences.english: If an expert intentionally makes a false verification, he shall assume legal responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 鉴定人故意作虚假鉴定的，应当承担法律责任。

sentences.english: Countries which prefer to rely on America are happy to maintain the pretense.
sentences.chinese: 而倾向依赖于美国的国家也乐意保持这种虚假。

sentences.english: In the Kali Age, there will be many false religionists.
sentences.chinese: 在卡利年代，会有很多错误和虚假的宗教。

sentences.english: The false gods arranged sacred geometry that shattered the 1 billion souls into subservience .
sentences.chinese: 虚假神们改写了神圣几何学去粉碎那1亿个灵魂。

sentences.english: It should make it easier to refuse to continue to accept such untruths.
sentences.chinese: 这必须变得更简单来拒绝继续接受这些虚假骗术。

sentences.english: We refuse to partake in the production of illusive advertisements.
sentences.chinese: 本公司拒绝承做虚假广告。

sentences.english: Do you think the super star need to take the responsibility of the false advertising?
sentences.chinese: 你认为这些为虚假广告代言的明星应该负责任吗？

sentences.english: Washington cannot afford to wage another war on false pretenses.
sentences.chinese: 美国不可能因虚假的理由而发动另一场战争。

definition: to compile/to draw up/to fabricate/to invent/to concoct/to make up/to cook up
to counterfeit/to falsify/to cheat/to defraud/fraudulent/to behave affectedly
to give a false picture of the situation
